title: Action Research Workshop for Unconscious Experiential Learning Utilization in Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: For language education professionals, developing the ability to systematically capture/analyze unconscious learning experiences in daily organizational tasks and apply them to future educational program design.

learning_goals: Participants can identify at least five cases of unconscious learning within an organization and apply recording tools through three action research cycles
Each team demonstrates at least 80% effectiveness of their developed/executed experiential learning mapping technique during peer evaluation
At the course conclusion, learners can present the learning organization transformation process in at least three stages in the final project
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
